tool_description: Quick currency converter using IMF and bank data
name: Simple Currency Conversion
title: Simple Currency Conversion

api_list.name: Convert Currency
api_list.description: Convert from one currency to another

required_parameters.name: to
required_parameters.description: Target ISO 4217 currency code, ex: EUR

optional_parameters.name: from
optional_parameters.description: Source ISO 4217 currency code. Default Value: USD

optional_parameters.name: amount
optional_parameters.description: Amount of the source currency to convert. Default Value: 1

optional_parameters.name: format
optional_parameters.description: Output format, text or json. Default Value: text

optional_parameters.name: decrease
optional_parameters.description: Decrease the unit exchange rate by the specified ammount. Useful to make minor adjustments to the exchange rate. Default Value: 0

optional_parameters.name: increase
optional_parameters.description: Increase the unit exchange rate by the specified ammount. Useful to make minor adjustments to the exchange rate. Default Value: 0
